title: Internet Dropping issue plz help!
body:
Heyy everyone.
ive been having an issue for about 2 day were my wifi will be perfectly fine when downloading on utube or the internet in general. but as soon as i start gaming, i will get 500+ ping and nothin will work until i close the game, any fixes?

replies.body:
The download rate you have for Youtube is not a good indication for how fast your computer can ping a server; ie. downloading a video is just not the same as playing a game, even though they both use the internet.

The servers have been a bit misbehaved of recent; it might just be something on Riot's end, in which all you can do is wait it out.

What ISP are you with?
